typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		ToolNo as string,
		UseCount as string,
		LimitCount as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		UseCount as string,
		LimitCount as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		ToolNo as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		EditTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		UseCount,
		LimitCount,
		SequentialNumber,
		ToolNo,
		EMT,
		CreateTime,
		EditTime = EventTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
